examples: Sorry to interrupt, but there's someone to see you.
Lamento interrumpir, pero hay alguien que quiere verte.
Would you mind not interrupting with questions all the time?
¿Le importaría no interrumpir con preguntas todo el tiempo?
I hope I'm not interrupting you.
They were interrupted by a knock at the door.
Fueron interrumpidos por un golpe en la puerta.
